verses: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.
Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them.
with them that uphold my soul.
He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.
I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O
me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen
